message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL

The paper deals with the problem of incremental learning in artificial intelligence, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper specifically focuses on developing a new training strategy for incremental learning, which involves learning strong classifiers and data representation simultaneously, making it highly relevant to the aforementioned sub-categories. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.CV, followed by cs.AI, cs.NE, and cs.CL.
